content:
hey everyone! we just kicked off #SIG-Community this past tuesday. one of our first items is to draft a charter and figure out our scope to best serve this community. if you have any ideas on what you'd like to see from our SIG, can you please respond in our channel, here, or DM me with suggestions?

and of course, you're all welcome to join our ongoing meetings every other week on Tues at 15:30 UTC (see channel for details)
